title: KickStarter - Potato Salad App
summary: A mobile app to help you make delicious potato salad.
description: This project was inspired by a viral Kickstarter campaign. It's a fun, interactive mobile app that helps users create the perfect potato salad through step-by-step guidance, shopping lists, and potato science tips. Built using React Native and Firebase.

title: Velocity - Designed for Products
description: Velocity is a Bootstrap-based responsive HTML5 theme ideal for promoting product-based startups. It includes sections for product features, pricing, testimonials, and contact forms. Designed with speed and mobile usability in mind.

title: Tempo - Designed for Startups
description: Tempo is a modern, clean startup template tailored for early-stage companies. It features lead generation forms, calls to action, animated content, and smooth scrolling. Built with SCSS, jQuery, and minimal dependencies.

title: Delta - Mobile App Template
description: Delta is a beautiful landing page template for promoting mobile apps. It includes sections for app features, screenshots, testimonials, and download CTAs. Optimized for conversion and performance. Ideal for iOS/Android app marketing.

title: AAAAAAAAA
description: Delta is a beautiful landing page template for promoting mobile apps. It includes sections for app features, screenshots, testimonials, and download CTAs. Optimized for conversion and performance. Ideal for iOS/Android app marketing.
